com.wookler.zconfig.common

Class ConfigProviderFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.wookler.zconfig.common.ConfigProviderFactory

  • public class ConfigProviderFactory
extends java.lang.Object
    Factory class to provide config parser and config reader instances.

      • reader

        public static final AbstractConfigReader reader(java.net.URI uri)
                                         throws ConfigurationException
        Get a new instance of a Configuration reader. Type of reader is determined based on the SCHEME of the URI. SCHEME = "http", TYPE = HTTP SCHEME = "file", type = File
        Parameters:
        uri - - URI to get the input from.
        Returns:
        - Configuration Reader instance.
        Throws:
        ConfigurationException
